settings.hero_subtitle: Our instructors bring decades of real-world experience from leading amusement parks, manufacturers, and regulatory bodies worldwide.

settings.section_subtitle: Learn from industry leaders with decades of hands-on experience in amusement safety
settings.cta_description: Share your expertise and help shape the future of amusement industry safety. We're always looking for qualified professionals to expand our instructor network.

settings.instructor_bio: Dr. Johnson brings over 15 years of experience in amusement park safety, having worked with major theme parks and served on multiple ASTM F24 committees. She holds a Ph.D. in Mechanical Engineering with a specialization in ride dynamics and safety systems.
settings.specialties: Ride Safety Inspection|Risk Assessment|Staff Training|Regulatory Compliance|Emergency Response

settings.instructor_bio: Mike has spent over 20 years in amusement park operations, starting as a ride operator and working his way up to Director of Maintenance at one of the world's largest theme park chains. His hands-on experience makes complex maintenance procedures accessible to learners at all levels.

Lisa leads the integration of cutting-edge technology in amusement safety systems. With a background in both software engineering and safety consulting, she bridges the gap between traditional safety practices and modern technological solutions.
settings.specialties: Safety Technology|Digital Systems|IoT Integration|Data Analytics|Innovation Management

settings.instructor_bio: James has worked extensively with state and federal regulatory bodies, helping to shape modern amusement device regulations. His expertise in navigating complex compliance requirements is invaluable for operators seeking to maintain the highest safety standards.

Maria specializes in developing comprehensive training programs that translate complex safety concepts into practical, actionable knowledge. Her background in adult education and safety management creates engaging learning experiences that stick.
settings.specialties: Curriculum Development|Adult Learning|Safety Management|Training Delivery|Assessment Design

settings.instructor_bio: Robert brings a unique manufacturer's perspective to safety education, having spent 16 years designing and engineering attractions for leading ride manufacturers. His insights into design intent and engineering principles provide deep technical understanding.
settings.specialties: Ride Design|Engineering Principles|Manufacturing Standards|Technical Documentation|Design Reviews

settings.content_body: Our instructor team covers every aspect of amusement industry safety, from foundational principles to cutting-edge innovations. This comprehensive coverage ensures that learners receive well-rounded education that prepares them for real-world challenges.

settings.credential_1_desc: Comprehensive ride safety protocols, inspection procedures, and risk assessment methodologies
settings.credential_2_desc: Day-to-day operations management, preventive maintenance, and emergency response procedures
settings.credential_3_desc: Modern safety technologies, digital systems integration, and future-forward solutions
